item.title: WILD HEARTS S ‘Four-Person Multiplayer Introduction’ video
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/wild-hearts-s-four-person-multiplayer-introduction-video

  • Switch 2

A 14-minute look at multiplayer on Switch 2.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Omega Force have released a 14-minute gameplay video of WILD HEARTS S introducing four-person multiplayer.

Here is an overview of the game, via Koei Tecmo:

About

Hunting. Automaton. Beasts.

Hunt down giant beasts through a fantasy world inspired by feudal Japan. Craft a wide variety of “Karakuri” (Automaton) to assist in hunting and skillfully wield uniquely crafted weapons to cut these creatures down to size.

Now supports up to four players on the Nintendo Switch 2 system! Enjoy hunting in various styles.

  • Key Features

    Giant Nature-Infused Beasts – Fearsome beasts are infused with the ferocious power of nature. They are as beautiful and terrifying as nature itself. As a hunter, you may sometimes need to join forces with teammates to stand against their overwhelming power.

  • Craft With Karakuri to Alter Hunting Grounds – Craft various Automaton “Karakuri” to use while hunting beasts, such as beast-piercing blades, protective shields, and traps to stop movement. Even between hunts, “Karakuri” are useful when searching for beasts, healing wounds, flying in the sky, and more. Craft your ideal hunting grounds to maneuver freely.
  • Diverse Combat Styles – Materials collected will transform into new weapons and armor, guiding the player on their journey to hunt even more powerful beasts. Use a variety of equipment to hunt your prey.
  • Four Seasons-Based Hunting Grounds – No one remembers why the Kemono began their rampage through a once-prosperous Azuma. Fueled by desperation, they wield the power of primal nature at its most destructive. Fierce battles unfold across the beautiful scenery that changes with the four seasons.

WILD HEARTS S is due out for Switch 2 on June 5.

Watch the footage below.

item.title: Baccarat card battle game Sengoku Baccarat announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/baccarat-card-battle-game-sengoku-baccarat-announced-for-pc

Publisher Flyhigh Works and developer Q-Cumber Factory have announced Sengoku Baccarat, a baccarat card battle game. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Flyhigh Works:

About

Sengoku Baccarat is a fusion of the casino card game Baccarat and a roguelike card battle game.

Test your luck, go with the flow when you can, rebel a little when you need to. Fight your way through the masses of demons!

Story

It is the year 20XX. A giant rift appears in the border that separates the “mortal world” (Utsushi-yo) from the “everlasting world” (Toko-yo).

As the balance between the two worlds crumble, the inhabitants of Toko-yo overflow into the Utsushi-yo, our mortal world. Ghosts, spirits, demons, even incarnations of gods and Buddha enter the Utsushi-yo, causing chaos.

With intention of suppressing the situation, the government attempts to fight these malignant spirits using military force, but their efforts are in vain; normal methods of warfare are not effective against the entities of Toko-yo, known as “Bakara,” who exist under different set of logic altogether.

Setsuna, a swordsman who wields the “demon slayer sword” which has been passed down for generations, may be mankind’s last hope to save the world. He makes his way to the rift, now named the “Oomikado”…

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Battle With Baccarat! – The battle system is based on the casino game Baccarat. If you have the better hand, you get to attack! If your hand is weaker, the enemy gets to attack. But even if your cards don’t look good, don’t give up! Make use of your skills and items to reinvent your hand and strengthen your attack and defense stats!
  • Deckbuilding – Find Talismans (Skill cards) on your journey to strengthen your deck! Discover combinations you can use to pave your way to victory!
  • Items to Collect! – There are Amulets (Relics) that can give you passive skills and Scrolls (Potions) that can fortify you temporarily. Use these items in tandem with your Talismans for powerful effects!
  • Roguelike – Every time you start a game, the map changes. You’ll never travel the same map twice. (Although, it is possible to recreate the map through SEED value.) Apart from fighting enemies in the map, you’ll bump into events that require you to make decisions, and you may also find a merchant that will sell you items. Prepare yourself for what’s to come!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Switch digital pre-orders now available.

Publishers Aniplex and SEGA, and developer CyberConnect2 have released a trailer for Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2, introducing the Swordsmith Village Arc.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 1 in Japan and August 5 in the west. While digital pre-orders were previously available for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC, pre-orders are also now available for Switch.
